group_1.textRight: Wow! How amazing!@There's soo many people!

group_1.textLeft: As expected of the first sale of the new year.

group_1.textRight: This place is a little more expensive than my usual@shops, but...

group_1.textLeft: Tsukasa, is it okay to splurge a little just for today?

group_1.textRight: After all, wouldn't it be a waste to not buy@something?
I've decided, I'm spending today!

group_1.textLeft: I too will purchase things as I like.

group_1.textRight: We bought so much.

group_1.textLeft: We did buy so many things.

group_1.textRight: My hands have started trembling on their own.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Have they begun making their own decisions now?!
For some reason, I have a bad feeling.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, don't worry.
Originally, I wanted to buy a coat somewhere.
But, I wonder if I should be saving for a scarf.

group_1.textLeft: A scarf you say?
However, if your neck remains cool, you may@catch a cold, so...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, so I'm going to make a scarf by hand instead.
Y'know, I'm used to detailed handicraft work.
Maybe, since I'm thinking about making it, I should@just go and do it.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...
Then I too, shall make mine by hand@just like Tsukasa!

group_1.textRight: Whaaat~?
Tsukuyo, are you experienced with handicrafts?

group_1.textLeft: Though not as well, as a member of the Akatsuki@family, I take lessons for it.

group_1.textRight: But Tsukuyo has money.
I think you should just buy it normally, y'know~

group_1.textLeft: Nay, I have made my decision.
The next time I meet with Tsuakasa to play...
I will have completed a splendid scarf.

group_1.textRight: Hmm, Tsukuyo sure is nice.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: I wonder if it's almost time for Tsukuyo to meet@me here...

group_1.textLeft: Heey!@Tsukasaaa~

group_1.textRight: Ah.
...That scarf.

group_1.textLeft: That is correct!
I knitted it by hand myself.
It is so wonderful; I really do like it.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's very well made...

group_1.textLeft: Tsukasa's is...
Eh?!
...Is that really handmade?

group_1.textRight: It's handmade.

group_1.textLeft: It looks as if it was bought from a store...@[chara:101851:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:101851:motion_100][chara:101851:cheek_0][chara:101851:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101851:lipSynch_1]It's truly quite amazing!
The general developement time...@Just how many days could that have possibly taken?

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe, some dozens of minutes I guess...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101851:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Dozens of minutes?!
S-such an answer...@The amount of time I took was...

group_1.textRight: ...I can tell.
If you look closely, Tsukuyo's fingers have bumps@all over...
You must have missed sleep...and stayed up late@making it.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Tsukuyo is so affectionate as usual.
You're getting a little too nosy.

group_1.textLeft: Affectionate...?@Has that not always been the case?
Putting that aside, Tsukasa!@Next time, when we can get enough time to...
I would like to learn about Tsukasa's craft!

group_1.textRight: Eh?@My craft...?
...I don't mind, I suppose.

group_1.textLeft: Then it is a promise!
[chara:101851:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ehe, ehehehe.

group_1.textRight: What?@You're smirking.

group_1.textLeft: That is because I am happy.

group_1.textRight: Happy?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
Because with this...
I have gained one more.
A shared interest with Tsukasa.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101950:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: With this we can talk even more!

group_1.textRight: A shared interest...@You mean making things...?
So that's it... I misunderstood...

group_1.textLeft: Misunderstood...?

group_1.textRight: I thought, without a doubt, that you were pitying@me... That was what I was thinking...

group_1.textLeft: Pitying...?
I am the one that is inexperienced with handicrafts,@right?

group_1.textRight: Tsukuyo...

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: You're a dummy.

group_1.textLeft: Should I be at the same level as you?!
